## UIConfig interface

A base structure of user interaction (UI) configuration

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface UIConfig<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [default?](./teamsfx-api.uiconfig.default.md) | T | <i>(Optional)</i> default input value |
|  [name](./teamsfx-api.uiconfig.name.md) | string | name is the identifier of the UI |
|  [placeholder?](./teamsfx-api.uiconfig.placeholder.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> placeholder in the UI |
|  [prompt?](./teamsfx-api.uiconfig.prompt.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> prompt text providing some ask or explanation to the user |
|  [step?](./teamsfx-api.uiconfig.step.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> <code>step</code> and <code>totalSteps</code> are used to describe the progress in question flow <code>step</code> is the sequence number of current question |
|  [title](./teamsfx-api.uiconfig.title.md) | string | human readable meaningful display name of the UI |
|  [totalSteps?](./teamsfx-api.uiconfig.totalsteps.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> <code>totalStep</code> is the number of questions totally |
|  [validation?](./teamsfx-api.uiconfig.validation.md) | (input: T) =&gt; string \| undefined \| Promise&lt;string \| undefined&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A function that will be called to validate input and to give a hint to the user. |
